component.text: Considerations When Choosing Either a Prototype or a Pilot Test

Prototype Pilot
+ Independent of the "Live" network + Multiple or unlikely conditions that could cause failure can be tested + Changes can be made at any time because users do not depend on the functionality + Highly controlled simulated environment + No risk + Real-world network traffic + In cases where the physical environment or actual traffic conditions are needed to determine operation + The network response can be tested in unplanned and unpredictable situations
- Not the actual environment - Not as much variability - Not as easily controlled - Required coordination with user groups - Not as flexible - High visibility and risk
